reference.title: Navigation Commands
reference.shortdesc: Commands for navigating and visualizing DITA content structure.

section.title: DITA: Show Map Visualizer
section.p: Opens an interactive tree view showing your DITA map hierarchy.

ul.li: Hierarchical View: Displays maps, chapters, and topics in a tree structure
Click Navigation: Click any node to open the corresponding file
Real-time Updates: Tree updates when files are added or removed
Status Indicators: Shows validation status for each file

ol.li: Run the command from Command Palette
The visualizer opens in a side panel

section.title: Ctrl+Click Navigation
section.p: DitaCraft provides smart navigation using Ctrl+Click (Cmd+Click on Mac) on various attributes.

strow.stentry: Navigates to the content reference target (file#id)
Resolves the key and navigates to its target
Resolves the key and navigates to the content reference

section.title: Go to Definition
section.p: Press F12 or right-click and select Go to Definition to navigate to referenced content.
This works on the same attributes as Ctrl+Click navigation.

section.title: Peek Definition
section.p: Press Alt+F12 to peek at the definition without leaving your current file.

section.title: Find All References
section.p: Press Shift+F12 to find all places where the current element or ID is referenced.
